instruction.value: for 3 days (first of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer initial dose 30 minutes prior to ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 3 days (second of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer dose mixed in same bag with ifosfamide, diluted in 1000 mL 2/3-1/3 over 4 hours.
for 3 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose following chemotherapy treatment, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 4 days (first of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer initial dose 30 minutes prior to ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 4 days (second of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer second dose at 2 hours post-ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 4 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose at 4 hours post-ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 5 days (first of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer initial dose 30 minutes prior to ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 5 days (second of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer second dose at 2 hours post-ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 5 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose at 4 hours post-ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 5 days (first of 2 doses per daily treatment). Administer initial dose 30 minutes prior to ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.

for 5 days (second of 2 doses per daily treatment). Start second dose immediately after etoposide infusion and administer dose over 21 to 22 hours, diluted in 1000 mL dextrose 5%-sodium chloride 0.45%.
for 2 doses on Day 5. Administer dose over 30 minutes at zero hours and at 2 hours diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride.
for 3 days (second of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer second dose at 2 hours post-ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes. (Total 3 doses/day).
for 3 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose at 4 hours post-ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes. (Total 3 doses/day).
for 3 days (first of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer initial dose 30 minutes prior to ifosfamide over 15 to 30 minutes.
for 3 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose following chemotherapy treatment over 15 to 30 minutes.
for 3 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose over 15 to 30 minutes following post-hydration treatment.
for 3 days (first of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer initial dose prior to ifosfamide over 15 to 30 minutes.
for 3 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose over 15 to 30 minutes following chemotherapy.
Administer dose mixed in same bag with ifosfamide, diluted in 1000 mL 2/3-1/3 over 4 hours.
for 4 days (second of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer second dose at 4 hours after the end of the ifosfamide infusion, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 4 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose at 8 hours after the end of the ifosfamide infusion, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes.
for 3 days (second of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer second dose at 2 hours post completion of ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes. (Total 3 doses/day).
for 3 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose at 4 hours post completion of ifosfamide, diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 15 minutes. (Total 3 doses/day).
for 3 days (first of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer initial dose 15 minutes prior to ifosfamide over 15 to 30 minutes.
for 3 days (second of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer dose mixed in same bag with ifosfamide, diluted in 1000 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 4 hours.
for 3 days (third of 3 doses per daily treatment). Administer third dose over 15 minutes following chemotherapy.
for 3 days. Administer as continuous infusion over 24 hours starting 60 minutes prior to first dose of cyclophosphamide. Dilute dose in 1000 mL 0.9% sodium chloride.
ONCE. Administer dose diluted in 250 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 30 minutes.
ONCE. Administer dose diluted in 1000 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 12 hours following cyclophosphamide.
ONCE. Administer dose diluted in 500 mL D5W over 1 hour, concurrently with cyclophosphamide.
for 3 doses. First of 3 doses. (each dose calculated as 20% of cyclophosphamide dose). Administer initial dose concurrently with cyclophosphamide, diluted in 500 mL D5W over 2 hours.
for 3 doses. Second of 3 doses. (each dose calculated as 20% of cyclophosphamide dose). Administer second dose at 4 hours after the end of the cyclophosphamide infusion.
for 3 doses. Third of 3 doses. (each dose calculated as 20% of cyclophosphamide dose). Administer third dose at 8 hours after the end of the cyclophosphamide infusion.
for 3 doses. First of 3 doses. Administer initial dose concurrently with cyclophosphamide, diluted in 500 mL D5W over 2 hours.
for 3 doses. Second of 3 doses. Administer second dose at 4 hours after the end of the cyclophosphamide infusion.
for 3 doses. Third of 3 doses. Administer third dose at 8 hours after the end of the cyclophosphamide infusion.
Q2H for 2 doses on Day 5. Administer dose over 30 minutes at zero hours and at 2 hours diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride.
Administer dose diluted in 250 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 30 minutes.
Administer dose diluted in 1000 mL 0.9% sodium chloride over 12 hours following cyclophosphamide.
Administer dose diluted in 500 mL D5W over 1 hour, concurrently with cyclophosphamide.

additionalnotes.value: Adjuvant or First Line Metastatic Sarcoma (Ewing/PNET).
Adjuvant or First Line Metastatic Sarcoma (Ewing/PNET).
Metastatic Soft Tissue Sarcoma. Mesna treatment with ifosfamide.
Soft Tissue Sarcoma. Mesna treatment with ifosfamide.
Rhabdomyosarcoma, Metastatic Rhabdomyosarcoma, Osteosarcoma, Ca Testes. Mesna treatment with ifosfamide.
Osteosarcoma. Doses less than 1000 mg diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride and doses greater than or equal to 1000 mg diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride.
Osteosarcoma.
Soft Tissue Sarcoma. Doses less than 1000 mg diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride and doses greater than or equal to 1000 mg diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride.
Soft Tissue Sarcoma.
Sarcoma. Doses less than 1000 mg diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride and doses greater than or equal to 1000 mg diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride.
Sarcoma.
Sarcoma (gynecology). Mesna treatment with ifosfamide.
Germ Cell Cancer Mediatinal Primary. Mesna treatment with ifosfamide.
Penile cancer. Mesna treatment with isfosfamide.
GU-Germ Cell Cancer, Germ Cell Cancer. Doses less than 1000 mg diluted in 50 mL 0.9% sodium chloride and doses greater than or equal to 1000 mg diluted in 100 mL 0.9% sodium chloride.
GU-Germ Cell Cancer, Germ Cell Cancer.
Relapsed or Refractory Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma. Mesna treatment with cyclophosphamide. Use ideal body weight in dosing calculations.
Lymphoma. Mesna treatment with cyclophosphamide.
Multiple Myeloma. Mesna treatment with cyclophosphamide.
BMT. Mesna treatment with cyclophosphamide.
Osteosarcoma.

backgroundinformation.value: Uroprotextant for toxicity caused by cyclophosphamide, ifosfamide therapy.
